A '''spin model''' is a classical or quantum [[mathematical model]] used in physics to describe and explain [[magnetism]] at the microscopic or quantum scale at finite temperature (usually [[classical spin models]]) or zero temperature ([[quantum spin model]]s).
A '''spin model''' is a classical or quantum [[mathematical model]] used in physics to describe and explain [[magnetism]] at the microscopic or quantum scale at finite temperature (usually [[classical spin models]]) or zero temperature ([[quantum spin model]]s).
